Windy City Wig & Weave

The Most Trustworthy Wig Works In The Midwest!

Chicago's Premier Wig & Weave Works Since 1946

Our founder, Chadwick Wentz, learned wig-making from the old French masters while off-duty in Allied-liberated France during the final years of World War 2. He put his hard-won knowledge to work immediately after returning to his hometown Chicago. The result was some of the finest wig-work seen on this side of the Atlantic.

Our Commitment To Uncompromising Quality

We fuse Old-World craftsmanship with computer-age design techniques to craft superior wigs and weaves. There are no other wig works which deliver at our level on any of the 8 common measures of wig quality.

Let's Do Business

We only accept high-volume wig & weave orders. Email us at sales@windycitywig.com for sales inquiries.
